burning_torch_3.glb.description: A detailed 3D model of a burning torch featuring animated flames and realistic lighting effects. The model includes a wooden handle with a metal holder, and a dynamic fire animation for added realism.

burning_torch.glb.description: A highly detailed 3D model of a burning torch with animated flames and realistic lighting effects. It features a wooden handle with a metal holder and includes a dynamic fire animation that enhances visual realism.
